active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate how device encryption requirements contribute to zero-trust architecture in enterprise MDM frameworks. Consider scenarios where encryption alone is insufficient (e.g., weak key management) and propose mitigations based on NIST SP 800-111 and SP 800-124 Rev. 2.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
